message: Reminder: You are registered for our Virtual Isolation: Is Hyperconnectivity Helping or Harming the Legal Professional? on Friday, October 27 at 2:00 p.m. ET/11:00 a.m. PT.
You can use this link to join us.
If you have trouble, please contact Justia Support for assistance.

Please note: This presentation is accredited for one hour of Competence Issues MCLE credit in California. If you want CLE credit, you will need to upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to take advantage of this exclusive benefit.

Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation! You must complete your attendance verification to receive CLE credit. As a reminder, if you have a free Justia Connect membership, you must upgrade to Justia Connect Pro to receive CLE credit.
The steps below must be completed by 12:00 p.m. PT on Sunday, October 29, 2023 to receive credit.
number-list: Input the attendance verification code received during your presentation.
Follow the remaining prompts in the form to input all pertinent information and offer evaluation of the MCLE presentation.
Download your certificate, and you’re done!
message2: If you have any questions about verification, please contact Justia Support.

message: Thank you for joining us for our recent Justia Webinars presentation, Virtual Isolation: Is Hyperconnectivity Helping or Harming the Legal Professional? We love connecting our members with new learning opportunities and hope you found the webinar both engaging and informative.
As we continue to plan future Justia Webinars for Justia Connect members, we want to hear from you! If you have not already done so, please share your feedback about your recent webinar experience.
